name: Aim X HD: Glow Bubble Cut
name_original: Aim X HD: Glow Bubble Cut
description:
Aim X HD : Glow Bubble Cut
Can you beat the world best 77 seconds?

World Best Game Top Scores:
Kyle Rayner: 92.00101
Daniel Roman: 89.60087
James Dawkins: 77.65014

So so easy to play. Drag your finger anywhere on the screen to slash your sword. Slice the glowing blue bubbles but don't cut the red bubbles.

The music is relaxing, firework flash fx appear with each halo strike, and cutting through each halo feels as smooth as ice.

Download it for FREE and play our top game today!
